<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">
[Lucky Break](/Spells.aspx?ID=1815)
<actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 376 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Domain**
[Luck](/Domains.aspx?ID=81)

<row gap="medium">

 

**Trigger** You fail, but don’t critically fail, a saving throw

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Reroll the saving throw and use the better result. You then become temporarily immune for 10 minutes.
name: Lucky Break
